sense.def:
To heed someone's advice
pomeni ravnati se po nasvetu neke osebe;

seg.quote: David wished that he had heeded his father's warnings.

sense.def:
To take heed of what someone says
ali
to pay heed to someone
pomeni pazljivo razmisliti o tistem, kar nekdo reče.

cit.quote: biti pozoren, zmeniti se za kaj
